name: Introduction to Digital Communication in Communication Studies
description: An introduction to the realm of digital communication, including relevant topics such as digital media, online communication, and digital discourse.

name: Digital Design and Production
description: This course covers the various design and production elements of digital media and communication, including topics such as web design, graphic design, and multimedia production.
prerequisites: Introduction to Digital Communication in Communication Studies

name: Digital Media and Culture
description: This course examines the intersection of digital media and culture, looking at topics such as media sociology, media psychology, and media consumption.
prerequisites: Introduction to Digital Communication in Communication Studies

name: Digital Discourse
description: This course focuses on the use of digital communication to facilitate social interaction and communication, including topics such as online argumentation, digital rhetoric, and online collaboration.
prerequisites: Introduction to Digital Communication in Communication Studies

name: Advanced Digital Communication
description: This course covers the more complex elements of digital communication, including topics such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data mining.
prerequisites: Introduction to Digital Communication in Communication Studies
